entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:47 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
